This is a non-denominational Christian Bible study. The author uses the New International Version (NIV) or New King James Version (NKJV) when developing these studies. If you do not have a NIV or NKJV Bible, you can find one online: [Bible Gateway](https://www.biblegateway.com/versions/) [Bible Study Tools](https://www.biblestudytools.com/bible-versions/) # Studies There are year-long studies for you to choose. Each study has a topic for every month of the year. There are Bible verses for each week of the month. *Even though these studies were written in years past, do not hesitate to (re)visit them as often as you feel led to do so.* # Study Tips - Pray and seek wisdom and understanding from the Holy Spirit. - Read the Bible verse for the week multiple times to gain meaning and context. - Journal your thoughts for reflection later. # Poems Please enjoy some GOD-centered acrostic [poems](poems.qmd) designed to encourage your spirit and faith walk.
May GOD be glorified in your life!
